getMyRoles().details: Returns the roles bitmask of msg.sender if they are linked to a member and ACTIVE.

linkAddressToMember(address,string).details: Link address to member (no member existence check for bootstrap)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRole(string,uint256,bool).details: Update a member role bit (grant/revoke) in one function.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

validatePermission(address,uint256).details: Validate permission (member active + has role + user authorized)

getMyRoles().notice: If msg.sender is not linked to any member or the member is not ACTIVE, returns 0.
